Articles.Content:
We all have at least once tried to replicate a real-life jet, but we just can't make the right shaped wing. I propose Squad adds a custom wing, which you can make any size and shape wings.

 

The part would work this way:

  1. Left-clicking where we would start the wing
  2. Each time we left-click anywhere, a dot appears, and a line forms between the two points.
  3. Click on the hull again, and the wing is finished.
  4. If you left-click on one of the dots, you can move it just like parts in Offset mode.
  5. Right-clicking on the edge of the wing will create a new "dot" there, so you can make the wink even more custom-shaped.

 

I hope you support this idea, so Squad will add it.

Yet, more procedural pieces in the stock game would certainly not hurt...
